EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-10-04
EmailTemplate.subject: "Making Ship Happen"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 4,Â 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-2-keynote-lauren-knausenberger-and-bryon-kroger?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> "Making Ship Happen" How the US Air Force started operating like a startup and achieved their mission of building software their airmen love. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-2-keynote-lauren-knausenberger-and-bryon-kroger?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/overall?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Innovate at Startup Speed in a Software-Driven World The Built to Adapt Benchmark is a quantitative framework of indicators that gauges how well an organization builds, deploys, and operates software.The research explores how organizations align their product development and IT operations with business goals to build software that delivers desirable outcomes. See How You Measure Up <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/overall?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/that-moment-episode-10-nobody-builds-a-company-by-themselves?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> "Nobody Builds a Company by Themselves" In this week's episode of That Moment, Doree talks to Carolyn Rodz, founder of Alice on her personal pivot from failed entrepreneur to professional mentor. Then we hear from Penelope Gazin & Kate Dwyer, founders of Witchsy, a more mystical alternative to other online marketplaces. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/that-moment-episode-10-nobody-builds-a-company-by-themselves?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-siew-choo-soh?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> "Building Business Functionality Instead of Infrastructure" Siew Choo Soh, Managing Director, Group Head of Consumer Banking and Big Data/AI Technology at DBS Bank on how DBS Bank digitally transformed and what's important for developers. Watch the Keynote <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-siew-choo-soh?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/need-to-improve-your-build-pipelines-writing-too-much-yaml-then-head-to-cloud-foundry-summit-europe-heres-our-show-preview?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Cloud Foundry Summit Europe 2018 Preview Need to Improve Your Build Pipelines? Writing Too Much YAML? Then Cloud Foundry Summit Europe is a must-attend. Here's our preview of this year's event. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/need-to-improve-your-build-pipelines-writing-too-much-yaml-then-head-to-cloud-foundry-summit-europe-heres-our-show-preview?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/peace-of-mind-for-developers-and-operators-buildpacks-is-now-a-cncf-project-welcome-cloud-native-buildpacks?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Welcome Cloud Native Buildpacks We're excited to announce, along with Salesforce's Heroku and the Cloud Native Computing Foundation was accepted as a CNCF Sandbox Project. Learn what it can do for you, and how to get started. Peace of Mind for Developers and Operators <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/peace-of-mind-for-developers-and-operators-buildpacks-is-now-a-cncf-project-welcome-cloud-native-buildpacks?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/protect-your-external-service-credentials-with-service-instance-sharing-and-the-credhub-service-broker-we-explain-how?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Protect Your External Service Credentials with Service Instance Sharing and the CredHub Service Broker With the CredHub Service Broker and Service Instance Sharing, platform owners can drastically reduce the complexity of managing external service credentials throughout the platform. We Explain How <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/protect-your-external-service-credentials-with-service-instance-sharing-and-the-credhub-service-broker-we-explain-how?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 10/09-10/10, SpringOne Tour, San Francisco <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/10-10/11, Cloud Foundry Summit Europe, Basel <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/eusummit2018/]]>
10/10, Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.3: A First Look, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-10-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-3-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
